
                            
                            <p>感觉都要换，只是想玩大型点的游戏，如果可以5070怎么样，速度啥的其他无所谓，请大佬看看主板和CPU要换吗，回复的大佬都日进斗金<img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/09/131838p3p33p9npshz0pnp.png" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202503/09/131838p3p33p9npshz0pnp.png"> </p>
